scripts.msg_lint_fail: FAIL='\033[0;31m'; CYAN='\033[0;36m'; NC='\033[0m'; echo "${FAIL}𝗫${NC} ${CYAN}LINT_CHECK${NC}: The file(s) listed above failed linting 👎. Fix them and try again." && exit 1
scripts.msg_lint_pass: PASS='\033[0;32m'; CYAN='\033[0;36m'; NC='\033[0m'; echo "${PASS}✔${NC} ${CYAN}LINT_CHECK${NC}: All files passed linting 👔."
scripts.msg_prettier_fail: FAIL='\033[0;31m'; CYAN='\033[0;36m'; NC='\033[0m'; echo "\n${FAIL}𝗫${NC} ${CYAN}PRETTIER_CHECK${NC}: The file(s) listed above are ugly 🙁. Give them a makeover and try again." && exit 1
scripts.msg_prettier_pass: PASS='\033[0;32m'; CYAN='\033[0;36m'; NC='\033[0m'; echo "${PASS}✔${NC} ${CYAN}PRETTIER_CHECK${NC}: All files were verified as pretty 💅."
